MODULE.Name: Stream Character Slideshow
MODULE.Description: A Foundry VTT module that creates a character stat overlay for OBS streaming.
SETTINGS.EnableSlideshow_Hint: Cycle through active characters on a delay.
SETTINGS.DisplayMode_Hint: Choose between Browser Source or Green Screen pop-up.
SETTINGS.AnimationStyle_Hint: Choose the transition animation style between characters.
SETTINGS.BackgroundColor_Hint: Choose a background color for the character display.
